OriginalSource.Creator: Terese Winslow
OriginalSource.Comment: Updated skin tone to FP I

Removed the parens next to each of the lower case letters (a-d); Moved the letter “c” down and to the left so that it is on the collecting tubule that is covered with cancer; Changed the lines from the label “Structures that collect urine” to point to the large tube in the middle and one of the other smaller tubes; Removed the detail of the blue, yellow, and red renal tubules in the upper part of the kidney; Removed the label for Ureter

Labeled Left and Right adrenal glands; Made lines from label “Structures that collect urine” go to the large tubes in the middle of the kidney; Made the color and/or texture more distinctive to tell the difference between the fatty tissue and the cancer
Changed label from “Urine collecting structures in kidney” to “Structures that collect urine”
Made cancer spot in left kidney bigger
For the letter “c”, extended cancer out into the fatty tissue

ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Stage III kidney cancer; drawing shows cancer in the left kidney and in a) nearby lymph nodes, b) the renal vein, c) the structures in the kidney that collect urine, and d) the layer of fatty tissue around the kidney. Also shown are the right kidney, the right and left adrenal glands, and the vena cava.

Stage III kidney cancer; drawing shows cancer in the left kidney and in a) nearby lymph nodes, b) the renal vein, c) the structures in the kidney that collect urine, and d) the layer of fatty tissue around the kidney. Also shown are the right kidney, the right and left adrenal glands, and the vena cava.

Captions.MediaCaption: Stage III kidney cancer. The cancer in the kidney is any size and cancer has spread to a) nearby lymph nodes, b) the blood vessels in or near the kidney (renal vein or vena cava), c) the structures in the kidney that collect urine, or d) the layer of fatty tissue around the kidney.

Stage III kidney cancer. The cancer in the kidney is any size and cancer has spread to a) nearby lymph nodes, b) the blood vessels in or near the kidney (renal vein or vena cava), c) the structures in the kidney that collect urine, or d) the layer of fatty tissue around the kidney.
